title: Installation issue: Dakota
body:
Trying to build Dakota 6.9 on our CentOS system with GCC 9.2.0, and running into CMake errors as follows. All dependencies installed as part of this Spack installation process (other than GCC 9.2, which I installed via Spack earlier).

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install dakota@6.9%gcc@9.2.0
...
  >> 48    CMake Error at /lustre/eaglefs/projects/hpcapps/cchang/spack/opt/spa
           ck/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.2.0/boost-1.70.0-ndry3arsbxntjq4wieu3q
           bepgjun5t2a/lib/cmake/Boost-1.70.0/BoostConfig.cmake:124 (boost_find
           _dependency):
     49      boost_find_dependency Macro invoked with incorrect arguments for m
           acro
     50      named: boost_find_dependency
     51    Call Stack (most recent call first):
     52      /lustre/eaglefs/projects/hpcapps/cchang/spack/opt/spack/linux-cent
           os7-x86_64/gcc-9.2.0/cmake-3.15.1-i7g4ta5nioloaphnsgbfjheru7vtuch2/s
           hare/cmake-3.15/Modules/FindBoost.cmake:423 (find_package)
     53      CMakeLists.txt:369 (find_package)
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux el2 3.10.0-693.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Aug 22 21:09:27 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	CentOS Linux release 7.4.1708 (Core)
``` 

### Additional information

```console
$ spack spec --install-status dakota@6.9%gcc@9.2.0
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   dakota@6.9%gcc@9.2.0

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   dakota@6.9%gcc@9.2.0 build_type=RelWithDebInfo +mpi+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^boost@1.70.0%gcc@9.2.0+atomic+chrono~clanglibcpp~context~coroutine cxxstd=98 +date_time~debug+exception~fiber+filesystem+graph~icu+iostreams+locale+log+math~mpi+multithreaded~numpy patches=2ab6c72d03dec6a4ae20220a9dfd5c8c572c5294252155b85c6874d97c323199 ~pic+program_options~python+random+regex+serialization+shared+signals~singlethreaded+system~taggedlayout+test+thread+timer~versionedlayout visibility=hidden +wave arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@9.2.0+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]              ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@9.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64

[+]      ^cmake@3.15.1%gcc@9.2.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^ncurses@6.1%gcc@9.2.0~symlinks~termlib arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]              ^pkgconf@1.6.1%gcc@9.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^openssl@1.1.1c%gcc@9.2.0+systemcerts arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]              ^perl@5.26.2%gcc@9.2.0+cpanm patches=0eac10ed90aeb0459ad8851f88081d439a4e41978e586ec743069e8b059370ac +shared+threads arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]                  ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@9.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64

[+]              ^tar@1.31%gcc@9.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^libffi@3.2.1%gcc@9.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
```
